name: Rocket Security
description:
A simple adventure where you work an easy job as a security guard.

Not a horror game. Unless you want it to be.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • E to use
  • Mouse 1 to use or shoot

First version created as month 12 of 12

  • Idea

Give feedback on the 12 months project!
